item.title: Shri Nrisimha Mahamantra
item.description: go to indiatimes.com He who recites that spell (ugram viram mahavisnum), recites all the Vedas, he offers all sacrifices, he bathes in all sacred bathing places, he is released from the great sins and from the secondary sins, he attains great preeminence in sacred knowledge (great holiness), he purifies his relatives (the people of his line), his first ancestors from Brahman forth and his descendants unto the end of the world.
